name: University of Alberta Libraries LibQual - 2012 Survey Reports
description: This set contains two reports for the University of Alberta Libraries LibQual survey. This survey is used to understand, and act upon users' opinions of service quality in the library.

distribution.name: LibQual_ 2012_UAlberta_General_Report
distribution.description: This document contains general information about LibQual and the survey process.

distribution.name: LibQUAL_2012_Ualberta_Report.doc
distribution.description: This document contains a summary of the data collected by the University of Alberta Libraries.
